title: Revenge of the squares (variation)
text: Given a number N calculate the number R of different presentations of N in the form A×A+B×B with A and B being positive integers including zero. 1×1+2×2 and 2×2+1×1 are not different presentations. So for input 5 the output is 1.InputFifty tests with one positive integer < 109.OutputPrint the illustrated above number R for each test.ExampleInput:57986244509Output:102
